languages.text: "Жизнь на Лейре мирной не назовешь. Меня и таких, как я, искали специально — подбирали где могли, покупали у родителей, воровали даже. Я вот, например, из уличной банды загремела — продали меня детки постарше, когда смекнули, что со мной не так. При правящих династиях были школы, где нас и натаскивали, дурь выбивали. А потом — отправляли служить. Кто-то долго протягивал, как я, кто-то — сильно поменьше. Не все такие же ловкие и талантливые, как я. Переступали грань и досрочно выходили в тираж". {n}Идира выжидательно смотрит на вас. Потом, словно уточняя, жестом изображает взорвавшуюся голову и смеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Жизнь на Лейре мирной не назовешь. Я и таких, как я, искали специально — подбирали где могли, покупали у родителей, воровали даже. Я вот, например, из уличной банды загремела — продали меня детки постарше, когда смекнули, что со мной не так. При правящих династиях были школы, где нас и натаскивали, дурь выбивали. А потом — отправляли служить. Кто-то долго протягивал, как я, кто-то — сильно поменьше. Не все такие же ловкие и талантливые, как я. Переступали грань и досрочно выходили в тираж". {n}Идира выжидательно смотрит на вас. Потом, словно уточняя, жестом изображает взорвавшуюся голову и смеется.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Жизнь на Лейре мирной не назовешь. Меня и таких, как я, искали специально — подбирали где могли, покупали у родителей, воровали даже. Я вот, например, из уличной банды загремела — продали меня детки постарше, когда смекнули, что со мной не так. При правящих династиях были школы, где нас и натаскивали, дурь выбивали. А потом — отправляли служить. Кто-то долго протягивал, как я, кто-то — сильно поменьше. Не все такие же ловкие и талантливые, как я. Переступали грань и досрочно выходили в тираж". {n}Идира выжидательно смотрит на вас. Потом, словно уточняя, жестом изображает взорвавшуюся голову и смеется.{/n}

languages.text: “莱拉没有什么所谓的和平生活。像我这样的人特别受人追捧，那些人会从各种渠道弄到灵能者。他们会从灵能者的父母手中买下那些孩子，甚至直接把他们绑走。比如说我吧，我是从街头混混之中被带走的。那些大孩子注意到我和别人不太一样，于是就把我卖了。统治者家族都有各自的学校，他们在那里训练我们，把我们揍得鼻青脸肿，之后把我们统一送到军队服役。我们之中一部分人坚持了很长时间，但还有的人没过多久就撑不住了。你也明白，不是每个人都像我这么聪明，这么有天赋。有些人跨过了那条红线，早早地就完蛋了。{n}伊迪拉以期待的眼神看着你。随后，仿佛是为了解释她的意思，她用手比了个脑袋爆炸的手势，大笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}

languages.original_text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}

languages.text: «No hay ninguna vida pacífica en Leira. La gente como yo era especialmente valiosa: se hacían con todos los psíquicos que podían, ya fuera comprándolos o secuestrándolos. A mí, por ejemplo, me vendió mi banda callejera cuando los niños más mayores vieron que era un poco rara. Las dinastías gobernantes tenían escuelas para entrenarnos y darnos palizas. Después, nos enviaban a servir. Algunos aguantábamos mucho tiempo, pero otros no duraban nada. No todos pueden tener mi intelecto y mi talento, claro. Algunos cruzaron la línea y encontraron su final antes de tiempo». {n}Idira te mira, expectante. Después, como para clarificar sus palabras, usa las manos para representar una cabeza explotando y se ríe.{/n}

Después, como para clarificar sus palabras, usa las manos para representar una cabeza explotando y se ríe.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「レイラでは平穏な生活などありえない。私のような人間は特に狙われていたものよ。彼らは異能者を見つけるとどこにでも連れていくし、親から子供を買い取ったり、誘拐したりもしたわ。例えば、私はストリートギャングから誘拐されたの。年上の子たちが、私の様子がおかしいことに気づいて売り飛ばしたの。支配者のもとには学校があって、そこで私たちを鍛えると同時に、青ざめるまで殴りつけられたわ。そして私たちを兵役につかせた。長い間持ちこたえた者もいれば、長続きしなかった者もいる。みんなが私みたいに賢くて才能があるわけじゃないから。何人かは一線を越えて、その時が来る前に任務から外された」{n}イディラは期待に満ちた眼差しであなたを見つめる。そして、まるではっきりと分からせるかのように、両手で頭が爆発するさまを描いて笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Es gibt auf Leira kein friedliches Leben. Leute wie ich waren besonders begehrt — sie sammelten Psioniker auf, wo auch immer sie sie fanden, sie kauften Eltern ihre Kinder ab, sie entführten sie auch einfach. Ich zum Beispiel wurde von meiner Straßenbande verkauft, nachdem die älteren Kinder gemerkt hatten, dass ich reichlich sonderbar war. Die herrschenden Dynastien hatten Schulen, in denen sie uns ausbildeten und uns grün und blau schlugen. Und dann haben sie uns fortgeschickt, um zu dienen. Manche von uns haben lange ausgehalten, andere nicht. Nicht jeder ist so klug und talentiert wie ich, müsst Ihr wissen. Manche überschritten die Grenzen und wurden frühzeitig außer Gefecht gesetzt." {n}Idira blickt dich erwartungsvoll an. Dann, wie zur Klarstellung, deutet sie mit ihren Händen an, wie ein Kopf explodiert, und lacht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}

Ich zum Beispiel wurde von meiner Straßenbande verkauft, nachdem die älteren Kinder gemerkt hatten, dass ich reichlich sonderbar war. Die herrschenden Dynastien hatten Schulen, in denen sie uns ausbildeten und uns grün und blau schlugen. Und dann haben sie uns fortgeschickt, um zu dienen. Manche von uns haben lange ausgehalten, andere nicht. Nicht jeder ist so klug und talentiert wie ich, müsst Ihr wissen. Manche überschritten die Grenzen und wurden frühzeitig außer Gefecht gesetzt." {n}Idira blickt dich erwartungsvoll an. Dann, wie zur Klarstellung, deutet sie mit ihren Händen an, wie ein Kopf explodiert, und lacht.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « La paix n'existe pas dans ce monde. Les gens comme moi étaient activement recherchés. Dès qu'ils trouvaient un psyker, ils se l'appropriaient d'une manière ou d'une autre, même s'ils devaient l'acheter à ses parents ou l'enlever, purement et simplement. Moi, par exemple, je faisais partie d'un gang, et les gamins plus âgés m'ont vendue dès qu'ils se sont rendu compte que quelque chose clochait chez moi. Les dynasties au pouvoir avaient ouvert des écoles où ils nous formaient et nous battaient dès que quelque chose n'allait pas. Dès qu'on était prêts, ils nous envoyaient combattre. Certains ont réussi à tenir longtemps, mais d'autres non. Tout le monde n'est pas aussi doué et malin que moi, vous voyez. Ceux qui se sont permis de dépasser les limites n'ont pas fait long feu. » {n}Idira vous lance un regard significatif puis, comme pour clarifier ses propos, se sert de ses mains pour mimer une tête qui explose avant d'éclater de rire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}

Dès qu'ils trouvaient un psyker, ils se l'appropriaient d'une manière ou d'une autre, même s'ils devaient l'acheter à ses parents ou l'enlever, purement et simplement. Moi, par exemple, je faisais partie d'un gang, et les gamins plus âgés m'ont vendue dès qu'ils se sont rendu compte que quelque chose clochait chez moi. Les dynasties au pouvoir avaient ouvert des écoles où ils nous formaient et nous battaient dès que quelque chose n'allait pas. Dès qu'on était prêts, ils nous envoyaient combattre. Certains ont réussi à tenir longtemps, mais d'autres non. Tout le monde n'est pas aussi doué et malin que moi, vous voyez. Ceux qui se sont permis de dépasser les limites n'ont pas fait long feu. » {n}Idira vous lance un regard significatif puis, comme pour clarifier ses propos, se sert de ses mains pour mimer une tête qui explose avant d'éclater de rire.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Leira'da huzur içinde yaşamak diye bir şey yoktur. Bilhassa benim gibilerin peşine düşen çok olur. Ruhsezerleri buldukları yerde kapıverirler. Çocukları ana babalarından satın alırlar, hatta kaçırırlar. Ben mesela bir sokak çetesinden alındım. Yaşça büyük çocuklar, bende ters bir şeyler sezdikleri gibi beni satıverdiler. Hüküm süren hanedanlıkların okulları vardır. Orada bizi hem eğittiler hem de öldüresiye dövdüler. Sonra da hizmet etmek üzere hepimizi sepetlediler. Bazılarımız iyi dayansak da diğerlerinin ömrü uzun olmadı. Herkes benim kadar zeki ve hünerli değil sonuçta. Bazıları çizgiyi aşıp vakitleri gelmeden emekliye ayrıldılar." {n}İdira, beklenti içinde sana bakıyor. Ardından netlik kazandırmak için elleriyle kafası patlarmış gibi yaparak kahkahaya boğuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There's no such thing as a peaceful life on Leira. People like me were especially sought after — they'd pick psykers up wherever they found them, buy kids off their parents, even just abduct them. Take me, for instance, I got taken from my street gang — the older kids sold me when they noticed there was something off about me. The ruling dynasties had schools where they trained us, and beat us black and blue. And then they packed us off to serve. Some of us held on for a long time, but others didn't last. Not everyone's as smart and talented as me, you know. Some people crossed the line and were out of commission before their time." {n}Idira looks at you expectantly. Then, as though clarifying, she uses her hands to indicate a head exploding and laughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Leira'da huzur içinde yaşamak diye bir şey yok. Özellikle benim türümdekilerin peşine düşen çok olur. Ruhsezerleri buldukları yerde kapıverirler. Çocukları ebeveynlerinden satın alırlar, hatta kaçırırlar bile. Kendimden örnek vermem gerekirse ben bir sokak çetesinden alındım. Benden büyük çocuklar, bende ters bir şeyler sezdikleri gibi beni sattılar. Hüküm süren hanedanlıkların okulları vardır. O okullarda bizi hem eğittiler hem de öldüresiye dövdüler. Sonra da hizmet etmek üzere hepimizi sepetlediler. Aramızdan bazıları uzun süre dayansa da diğerlerinin şansı yaver gitmedi. Herkes benim gibi zeki ve yetenekli değil sonuçta, farkındasındır. Bazıları hadlerini aştılar ve vakitleri gelmeden emekliye ayrıldılar." {n}İdira, beklenti içinde sana bakıyor. Ardından netlik kazandırmak için elleriyle kafası patlarmış gibi yaparak kahkahaya boğuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
